room_title: Escape room "A Night at the Castle" by The Escape Room Fishers in Indianapolis
review: We escaped from the castle. It was a great experience - lots of intricacies, rooms, and steps (literally, steps). Delani was really helpful and super positive and enthusiastic. We all enjoyed our evening at the castle. The Escape Room has good quality rooms!

room_title: Escape room "A Night at the Castle" by The Escape Room Fishers in Indianapolis
review: The Neuschwanstein Castle room was very immersive and kept us guessing throughout the entire hour. I highly recommend this room and ask for jester jake if you want a great room master. He did a great job in making it fun and interesting!

room_title: Escape room "A Night at the Castle" by The Escape Room Fishers in Indianapolis
review: We had a great time! We escaped the castle! Thank you medieval Megan, you were a great game master!

room_title: Escape room "A Night at the Castle" by The Escape Room Fishers in Indianapolis
review: Had a great time at the Castle today. Maggie did a great job and was very helpful!

room_title: Escape room "A Night at the Castle" by The Escape Room Fishers in Indianapolis
review: This was our third time in an escape room and it was by far the best one! We did the Night In The Castle and it was a great time, the staff did a great job and we definitely enjoyed it.
